trees.title: Root
trees.description: The root of this tree.  You can set tree-wide properties on this node and use them in an action's "args" property with this notation: `{{key_name}}`.

a2254ccd-6747-4749-9e98-b5dfdf4a9f06.name: sequence
a2254ccd-6747-4749-9e98-b5dfdf4a9f06.title: Sequence
a2254ccd-6747-4749-9e98-b5dfdf4a9f06.description: Takes multiple children and runs them from top to bottom (or left to right).  If any fail, this node fails, if all succeed, this node succeeds.

7e122337-45ae-4320-8452-75aaf7ec8e6f.name: 420330e3-cb7f-495f-8192-d20ee860da3a
7e122337-45ae-4320-8452-75aaf7ec8e6f.title: validate_number
7e122337-45ae-4320-8452-75aaf7ec8e6f.description: An instance of the tree.  You can add properties to this node and they will be available in action nodes in this tree (using syntax like `{{key}}`).  Properties defined on this node will overwrite the same property defined on the tree's root node.

c6ed3007-71ea-49e1-860a-91bc229c4805.name: runner
c6ed3007-71ea-49e1-860a-91bc229c4805.title: Sample.init_guesses_count()
c6ed3007-71ea-49e1-860a-91bc229c4805.description: An action that calls the function specified in the title (must be in valid Elixir terms).  The title can contain "template variables" (like `{{mod}}.rename({{new_name}}, true)`) which will be replaced with corresponding values looked up on the parent tree.

f82c539c-46c6-4520-938b-b00295711dab.name: repeat_until_succeed
f82c539c-46c6-4520-938b-b00295711dab.title: Repeat until succeed
f82c539c-46c6-4520-938b-b00295711dab.description: Takes one child which it repeats until it succeeds.  This node always succeeds.

9fa39aaf-4f18-41a7-8535-a00ca84a325f.title: try_to_guess_number
9fa39aaf-4f18-41a7-8535-a00ca84a325f.description: An instance of the tree.  You can add properties to this node and they will be available in action nodes in this tree (using syntax like `{{key}}`).  Properties defined on this node will overwrite the same property defined on the tree's root node.

fe1be13e-ba4c-4023-8f35-1959f1d2b9a1.name: wait
fe1be13e-ba4c-4023-8f35-1959f1d2b9a1.title: Wait <seconds> seconds
fe1be13e-ba4c-4023-8f35-1959f1d2b9a1.description: "Pauses" the bot for the number of seconds specified in the "seconds" property.  You can specify two numbers (like `1,10`) to wait a random number of seconds between those numbers.
